doc:
Julius Tannen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Julius_Tannen 0 Julius Tannen (16 May 1880 – 3 January 1965) was a monologist in vaudeville. He was known to stage audiences for his witty improvisations and creative word games. He had a successful career as a character actor in films, appearing in over 50 films in his 25-year film career. He is best known to film audiences from the musical Singin' in the Rain, in which he appears as the man demonstrating a talking picture early in the film. Julius_Tannen ( 16_May_1880 – 3_January_1965 ) was a_monologist in vaudeville . He was_known to stage_audiences for his_witty_improvisations and creative_word_games . He had a_successful_career as a_character_actor in films , appearing in over_50_films in his_25-year_film_career . He is_best_known to film_audiences from the_musical_Singin ' in the_Rain , in which he appears as the_man demonstrating a_talking_picture early in the_film .
